author: gstein
msg: Fix an error leak introduced in r921703
(read_propfile): if the file isn't there, clear the indicating error.

author: tommaso
msg: [CLEREZZA-124] - Feature name of Language extraction is 'language', not 'text', each method calls only the required descriptor, not the aggregated one

author: gstein
msg: Revamp the property reading within the upgrade code. A simple utility to
read a property hash, given a filename is the key change here.
(read_propfile): new function to read props from a given file
(read_many_wcprops): don't worry about streams and use read_propfile
instead of read_one_proplist (which is really designed to read a
series of wcprops from one mother file).
(migrate_props): switch over to read_propfile, and be wary for missing
"working_props" files. simplify using apr_pstrcat rather than a full

author: lukaszlenart
msg: Solved XW-737 - do not set defaultMessage with null or with empty message
